Class EnquiryDAO

java.lang.Object
BTOManagementSystem.Model.DAO.EnquiryDAO
public class EnquiryDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing Enquiry objects.

This class handles all file operations related to enquiries, including creating, reading, updating, and deleting enquiry records from a CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • saveEnquiry

      public boolean saveEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Saves a new enquiry by appending it to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry object to be saved
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry is saved successfully, false otherwise

    • loadAllEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> loadAllEnquiries()
      Loads all enquiries from the CSV file.
      Returns:
      a list of all Enquiry objects

    • getAllEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Returns all enquiries stored in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of Enquiry objects

    • getUnansweredEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getUnansweredEnquiries(String personIC)
      Retrieves all unanswered enquiries assigned to a specific officer or manager.
      Parameters:
      personIC - the NRIC of the officer or manager
      Returns:
      a list of unanswered Enquiry objects

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(String applicantNRIC)
      Retrieves all enquiries submitted by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      a list of Enquiry objects submitted by the applicant

    • editEnquiry

      public boolean editEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String newQuestion)
      Updates an enquiry's question.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry to update
      newQuestion - the new question text
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • replyEnquiry

      public boolean replyEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, String answer)
      Updates an enquiry with a response (reply).
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry to be answered
      answer - the reply text
      Returns:
      true if the reply was successfully saved, false otherwise

    • generateNewEnquiryID

      public String generateNewEnquiryID()
      Generates a new, unique enquiry ID based on existing entries.
      Returns:
      a new enquiry ID in the format "EQ#" (e.g., "EQ12")

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(String enquiryID)
      Deletes an enquiry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryID - the ID of the enquiry to delete
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was successfully deleted, false otherwise

    • getEnquiryById

      public Enquiry getEnquiryById(String enquiryID)
